name: Legacy of Flan
storyline:
In the beginning... there was a flan.

The flan populated the world, and lived peacefully there for centuries. But the advancement of humans and technology soon invaded their world.

Rumors of flan attacking villages quickly started a fierce hunt to destroy all flan.

The flan population went by many names among those who did not understand them...

They were called... slime... goo... tofu... muck... etc.

But the truth was... they were peaceful creatures...

The last flan city is facing annihilation by a group of iron clad fighters from the east, and so begins our story about a small group of young flan who have decided that enough is enough...

No more nice flan...
summary: Legacy of Flan is the first game in the Legacy of Flan series and is one of Scott's very first games ever to be released. It's an RPG game centered around little slime creatures known as "Flan" which you can change the species of with flan flavors you find after beating monsters where you must stop whoever's giving your species such a horrible name.
